Effect: Bargain Soul.name: Effect: Bargain Soul
Effect: Bargain Soul.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.witches.witches-feats.3Cp2WF4keYMXScaO]{Bargain Soul}.

You've earned enough respect in the eyes of your patron to now be able to broker additional minor pacts with them. You can offer a portion of your life energy to your patron in exchange for greater power. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} conditions or increase these values by 1 if you already had them, and a -1 circumstance penalty to death effects. In exchange, you can regain a spell slot at least one level lower than your highest spell level, and you regain a focus point as if you'd @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocused}. These penalties last until your next daily preparations and cannot be removed by any means. If you die while under the effects of your patron's bargain, your soul is forfeit, likely turned into an extraplanar creature with no memories of your last life to further your patron's agendas more directly. You can only be resurrected if your patron is contacted and bargained with before you can be restored via resurrection or other magic.

Effect: Monstrous Familiar.name: Effect: Monstrous Familiar
Effect: Monstrous Familiar.description:
Gained from @UUID[Compendium.witches.witches-feats.5feJ2C0PQ5oDuvGY]{Monstrous Familiar}.

This effect grants the extra HP from Monstrous Familiar to your familiar. Ensure you also grant it the spell effect of the form spell you select.

Spell Effect: Clinging Ice+.name: Spell Effect: Clinging Ice+
Spell Effect: Clinging Ice+.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MraZBLJ4Be3ogmWL]{Clinging Ice}.

Failure The target takes full damage, and takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the spell ends.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Lost in the Crowd.name: Spell Effect: Lost in the Crowd

Spell Effect: Promise Heart's Desire (Cr.name: Spell Effect: Promise Heart's Desire (Critical Success)

Spell Effect: Spirit's Blessing.name: Spell Effect: Spirit's Blessing
Spell Effect: Spirit's Blessing.description:
Gained from @UUID[Compendium.witches.witches-spells.pZk8ruSrvccWI1JZ]{Spirit's Blessing}.

You gain 2 resistance to physical damage but must attempt a DC 5 flat check whenever you take the Interact action with an object you are not already holding at the time you cast this spell. The target rolls the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.
